name: HaveIBeenPwned
0:
”Alexa, open Have I Been Pwned.”
”Has myusername been pwned?”
”Has myusername at email dot com been pwned?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: have i been pwned
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill searches the 'Have I Been Pwned' website using the provided username or email address and returns whether or not the user has been pwned, how many times they've been pwned, and the most recent pwn they were involved in. 'Have I Been Pwned' is a free service created by security researcher Troy Hunt and contains data about publicly disclosed data breaches. (https://haveibeenpwned.com)
